phrases: I easily beat Dodoria, who took such pride in his own power!
Even l'm surprised by how much I have improved.
It truly seems that my battle on Earth was not in vain.
Be that as it may, Dodoria did say something curious...
Those runts I was chasing earlier were Earthlings, were not they!?
I do indeed sense two large powers getting farther away.
Of course they could not be Earthlings, but it is still disturbing.
Maybe I should go look into it, just to see.
Whatever the case, I have to get rid of even the small fries that stand in my way.
The cave that Bulma- san is hiding in is right over there.
For this being a planet you have never been to before, I am surprised you remember so well.
We will be found if we stay here, will not we?
Never mind, just hurry up and suppress your Ki!
All we can do now is leave our fate up to heaven.
Will it be someone like that monster from earlier?
Dammit, how did they know where we were?
Both of the power readings have disappeared.
Over in that area, all of a sudden...
T - then he is on this planet, after all!
This is the absolute worst thing that could happen!
He was not wearing one of those Scouter devices.
And yet, how is it that he can tell where we are?
D- do not tell me he has the ability to sense Ki!
If that is the case, then this is bad.
We might be able to extinguish our Ki, but this kid still has a faint one.
Is it because I am not yet used to using this power sensing technique?
Maybe I should not have destroyed that Scouter.
I am sensing a small power.
It is no mistake this time.
He is going to find us!
It is near that rock over there.
At this point, all we can do is fight.
Even though we know we will get killed.
Right now, the first order of business is to get the two-
no, even just one of the remaining Dragon Balls.
Freeza and the others will no longer be able to get all seven together.
Then I will find the chance to take the five
that Freeza and company have away from them.
Their having lost their Scouters means
that luck has shifted in Vegeta- sama's favor!
I thought it was completely hopeless there.
We have that guy in the water to thank.
Anyhow, let us get back to where Bulma- san is,
while keeping our presence as masked as we can.
You said it was right close by, right?
We did not even fight, and I am already exhausted.
I would like to get some rest.
To be honest, I am starting to think we should not have come to this planet.
It might not be fair to the late Yamucha- san and the others,
but far from bringing everyone back to life,
it looks like we are just going to be adding to the deceased.
I am sure she is hiding deeper inside the cave.
What were you guys taking it so easy for!?
While leaving a young girl like me alone in a place like this!?
W- what is with the small-size Piccolo-looking kid there?
By any chance, is that a Namekian?
For now, just let us in, please.
We will fill you in on the details.
I just got some delightful news from my dad!
He said that Son- kun had blasted off for Planet Namek here!
And that he would arrive in just six days!
You see, apparently, my dad rebuilt the Saiyan spaceship
that Son- kun came in as a baby!
What is more, he said that Son- kun was doing some incredible training inside it
Next up, I will do this for 30 minutes!
Is it already time for the next item on the schedule?
What on earth is going on?
Part of the exterior of the spaceship has been damaged.
A meteor or something must have hit it.
lf you keep going like this, you will slip off course.
W- what is going to happen!?
You will not be able to go to Planet Namek.
You will become lost in space.
lnside the repair box, there should be some material and a powerful adhesive.
Wow, so this is space, huh?
You have got a lifeline, do not you?
I just have to reel myself in, huh?
You know, this speed is amazing.
Oh, that gave me a start.
Goku, the soles of your boots are magnets, so you can stand up and walk around.
Let us see, the course deviation caused by that damage is...
It was easier than I thought.
You have to make a course correction right now!
Goku, your position right now is at SU-83 by 643-XY.
If you keep going the way you are,
you are going to collide with the star Alpha HZ at 653-XY.
I cannot understand anything as complicated as that!
Oh, just do as I instruct you to, and it will be easy.
Hurry and get back inside the spaceship.
That is easy for you to say,
but my feet got stuck with the glue, and I cannot get free!
I do not want to die out here!
All right, all I can do now is count on this...
I get it, this is the result of the 20 G training!
All right, I am sure of myself now.
If I raise the Gs even more, I will become even stronger!
No question about it, it is a Namekian village.
They probably have one of the Dragon Balls.
Freeza and his men do not have Scouters!
No matter what action I may take now, they will not know about it!
And since the villagers are still alive,
that proves that Freeza and the others have not been here yet!
Is the one called Elder here?
I have come to take your Dragon Ball off your hands.
Would you tell me why you want the Dragon Balls?
Never mind, just hand it over quickly.
You have it, do not you?
I cannot allow you to have it.
I can sense evil in you.
Planet Namek was in the worst of circumstances.
At length, Vegeta had also set out in search of the Dragon Balls.
ls their only hope to await the arrival of Goku?
